dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Tesla's shares jumped 11% after hours, hitting $645.11.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tesla's shares jumped eleven percent after hours, hitting six hundred forty five point one one dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The shares spiked following the results announcement, rising 11% to $644.99 in after-hours Nasdaq trading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's on the heels of a net income of $108 million for the quarter, which is pretty wild considering they've never actually posted an annual profit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's on the heels of a net income of one hundred eight dollars million for the quarter, which is pretty wild considering they've never actually posted an annual profit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Silicon Valley-based carmaker reported net income for the quarter of $105 million on revenue of $7.38 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and revenue was $7.4 billion, which beat expectations by, uh, $400 million. Adjusted EPS came in at $2.16.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and revenue was seven point four dollars billion, which beat expectations by, uh, four hundred dollars million. Adjusted E P S came in at two point one six dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adjusted EPS was $2.14. That topped expectations of $1.72 a share and revenue of $7.02 billion, according to a Reuters survey of equity analysts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And once again, they got a huge boost from those regulatory credits—$135 million from selling them to other automakers. It's like free money, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And once again, they got a huge boost from those regulatory credits-one hundred thirty five dollars million from selling them to other automakers. It's like free money, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tesla once again got a boost from sales of zero-emission and other regulatory credits to other automakers in the quarter, booking $133 million of the free money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Elon Musk called last year a turning point, you know? They generated over a billion dollars in free cash flow in 2019.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Elon Musk called last year a turning point, you know? They generated over a billion dollars in free cash flow in twenty nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Last year was a turning point for Tesla, Musk said in a letter to investors. We demonstrated strong organic demand for Model 3, returned to GAAP profitability in 2H19 and generated $1.1B of free cash flow for the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But despite that, the full-year loss was still $860 million. So it's not all sunshine, but analysts like Adam Jonas at Morgan Stanley are starting to see Tesla as this cash-generative tech company now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But despite that, the full-year loss was still eight hundred sixty dollars million. So it's not all sunshine, but analysts like Adam Jonas at Morgan Stanley are starting to see Tesla as this cash-generative tech company now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Teslas full-year loss was $862 million on record revenue of $26 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they're aiming to deliver more than 505,000 vehicles this year, which is a big jump from 2019.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they're aiming to deliver more than five hundred five thousand vehicles this year, which is a big jump from twenty nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tesla aims to deliver more than 500,000 vehicles this year, up from 367,500 in 2019, including more than 295,000 Model 3s, priced from about $40,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they started Model Y production early in Fremont, and the Shanghai plant is already running. But that Berlin factory—uh, there's some local opposition to cutting down the forest there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they started Model Y production early in Fremont, and the Shanghai plant is already running. But that Berlin factory-uh, there's some local opposition to cutting down the forest there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a surprise announcement, it said production of Model Y crossovers started this month at the Fremont, California, plant, earlier than initially scheduled. That remains to be seen, owing to local German opposition to Teslas plans to cut down a portion of existing forest and concerns about how much water the plant will use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Jessica Caldwell from Edmunds pointed out that the Model Y might really hit the sweet spot for EV crossovers—prestigious but cheaper than luxury competitors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Jessica Caldwell from Edmunds pointed out that the Model Y might really hit the sweet spot for E V crossovers-prestigious but cheaper than luxury competitors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has a more prestigious brand than the mainstream hybrid nameplates but comes at a significantly less cost than the rest of the luxury competition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And all this stock surge pushed Musk's net worth to $32.4 billion, according to Forbes. Not exactly cash poor, even if Tesla itself hasn't turned an annual profit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all this stock surge pushed Musk's net worth to thirty two point four dollars billion, according to Forbes. Not exactly cash poor, even if Tesla itself hasn't turned an annual profit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes estimates the South African-born entrepreneurs net worth at $32.3 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Still, analysts like Garrett Nelson are cautious—worried about competition and the China factory ramp-up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, analysts like Garrett Nelson are cautious-worried about competition and the China factory ramp-up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We continue to see significant risks related to the China factory ramp-up, as well as rising EV competition from automakers still eligible for the full federal tax credit in the U.S., Nelson said in a research note.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a mixed bag, but after years of volatility, this quarter does feel like a shift in the narrative for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a mixed bag, but after years of volatility, this quarter does feel like a shift in the narrative for sure.
